verses.content: David chu a hung tar tah a, a hung upa ta hle a, a naupa Solomon chu Israel chunga lal dingin a siem tah a.
Chun, Israel upahai po po le thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu a ko khâwm vawng a.
Levi mihai chu kum sâwmthum chung tienga po chu tiem an na; an tiem dânbi ang chun an nizât chu, patling sîng thum le sâng riet an nih.
Hi laia mi sîng hni le za li hin LALPA in sin chu an enkawl ding a na;

chun, sâng ruk dang chu hotuhai le rorêltuhai an nih; sâng li chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai an na; sâng li dang chun, “Inpâkna dinga ka siem,” Davidin a ti, chuong thuomhnawhai le chun LALPA chu inpâk ding an nih.
David chun anni chu a pâwl peiin, Levi naupasalhai ang peiin a ṭheh a; Gerson le Kohath le Merari hai hi.
Gerson mia chun Ladan le Simei an na.
Ladan naupasalhai chu: Jehiel chu a hotu tak le, Zetham le Joel, hi pathum hi.
Simei naupasalhai chu: Selo- moth, Haziel le Haran, hi pathum hi. Hienghai hi Ladan sûngkuo pahnam luhai chu an nih.
Chun, Simei naupasalhai chu: Jahath, Zina, Jeus le Beria an nih. Hieng palihai hi Simei naupasalhai an nih.
Chun, Jahath chu a hotu tak a na, Ziza chu a pahnina; amiruokchu, Jeus le Beria chun naupasal tamtak an nei nawh a; chuleiin, tiem dânah thlâ khat an nih.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel, hi pali hi.

Amram naupasalhai chu: Aron le Mosie; chu, Aron le a naupasalhai chu ama le a nauhai chun thil inthienghai chu hlânthieng a, kum- khuoa LALPA hmaa riminhnik raw ding le, ama rawngbâwl ding le, ama hminga malsâwm kumkhuo dinga suktum an nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Mosie chu, a naupasalhai chu Levi hnam laia lam sa a na.
Mosie naupasalhai chu: Gerson le Eliezer an nih.
Gerson naupasalhai chu: Sebuel chu a hotu tak a nih.
Eliezer naupasalhai chu: Rehabia chu a hotu tak a nih. Eliezer chun naupasal dang a nei nawh a; amiruokchu, Rehabia naupasalhai chu an tam hle.
Izhar naupasalhai chu: Selo- mith chu a upa tak a nih.
Hebron naupasalhai chu: Jeria a hotu tak a na, a pahnina chu Amaria, a pathumna chu Jahaziel, a palina chu Jekameam.
Uzziel naupasalhai chu: Mika chu a upa tak a na, a pahnina chu Issia.
Merari naupasalhai chu: Mahli le Musi. Mahli naupasalhai chu: Eleazar le Kis.
Chun, Eleazar chu a thih a, naupasal a nei nawh, naunuhmei chau a nei; chun, an unaupahai, Kis naupasalhai chun anni chu nu- hmeiah an nei tâwl a.
Musi naupasalhai chu: Mahli leh, Eder leh, Jeremoth leh, pathum.

Hienghai hi an pahnam anga Levi naupasalhai chu an nih, tiemna laia an pahnamhai luhai chu an na, LALPA ina rawngbâwlnaa sinthaw- tuhai, tiem an ni dânbi anga hming suota nizât, kum sâwmhnia in- thawka chungtieng an nih.
David chun, “LALPA Israelhai Pathien chun a mihai chu muongna a pêk a;
chun, Levi mihai khawm chun a biekbûk le chutaka a rawngbâwlna bûr le bêlhai po po chu an zâwn a ṭûl bawk ta nawh a,” a ti sih a.
David thu nuhnung tak ang- in, Levi thlahai chu, kum sâwm- hni le a chungtienga po chu tiem an na.
An sinthaw chu Pathien ina rawngbâwlna sinhai: thil inthieng po pohai sukthieng dâm, pindanahai le inhuonna tuol sûnga LALPA Ina rawngbâwlnaa chun Aron naupa- salhai chu an ṭhangpui ding a ni sih a;
entirna bei ta ding dâm, bu thilinhlân dinga beiphit inditaka ding, chawl ṭhanglo bei amanih, bêl dara zêu amanih, a suonga suong amanih, ieng anga lien le ieng ang tiet ding khawmin;
zîng tina Pathien inpâk dinga ngîr dingin, chuong ang bawkin zântieng khawm;
châwlnihai dâm, thlatharhai dâm, ruoiṭhena bi ruotahai dâma LALPA hmaa chuong chungthua thaw rawp a ni ding dân ang peia LALPA kuoma pumrawhmang thilin- hlân chu inhlân ding dâmin;
chun, LALPA ina rawngbâwlna dinga, an unau Aron thlahai sin kawl le, hmun inthieng enkawlna sin le, intuokna in enkawlna sin chu an kawl ding a nih;
